name: HUM Nutrition Hair Sweet Hair
description: Up against thinning tresses? Enter HUM Nutrition's Hair Sweet Hair. Powered by strengthening medley of biotin, fo-ti, zinc and PABA, these vegan gummies are carefully formulated to maintain hair follicle health, colour vibrancy and support hair growth. Considering that one study showed that 38% of women with hair loss were found to have a biotin (a water-soluble B vitamin) deficiency, it's no head-scratcher that these easily consumed gummies harness biotin and zinc (an essential mineral) to support the health of your hair follicles. It doesn't end there... A herb that's used in traditional Chinese medicine, fo-ti is thought to increase circulation and encourage healthy hair growth; folic acid is thought to help the tissue in our hair, skin and nails grow smoothly and cells function properly when consumed regularly; an antioxidant known as PABA is employed to help to support the vibrancy of your natural hair colour and ward off grey by improving your body's ability to break down and efficiently utilise protein and use it more efficiently.

name: Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar Perfume Free
description: Microbiome is more than a ‘skin thing’ – it’s everywhere – and when it comes to vaginas, they have a unique ecosystem that’s easily knocked out of kilter. Which is why Gallinée have created their Cleansing Bar Perfume-Free, For Intimate Hygiene – a gentle, biotic-laced cleanser that helps to respect the vaginal environment. Highly acidic (its pH is around ~3.5) and with little bacterial diversity, the vaginal microbiome – located on the vulva and the vagina – provides crucial defence from infection, which is why it’s important to keep it in sync. To maintain harmony you must ‘feed’ the lactobacillus lactic acid, which is why Gallinée have updated their bestselling cleansing bar to make it even more gentle and perfect for keeping your vaginal environs happy and balanced. Gynaecologist tested and soap-free, this is brimming with pre- and postbiotics to support the microbiome, alongside lactic acid to encourage ‘good’ bacteria to flourish. What’s more, it’s made with 90% nature-derived ingredients and without any fragrance, colourings, parabens, mineral oil, silicones or phenoxyethanol, it is equally perfect for babies or compromised skin that’s especially sensitive.
how_to_use: For external use only. Massage into damp skin and rinse.

Your liver has many vital functions, but its primary purpose is to filter your blood with the production of bile which helps to remove waste (think: chemicals, toxins and excess hormones). Here’s how the Daily Detox helps your liver on its mission: an infusion of choline (a water-soluble vitamin) contributes to normal lipid metabolism and the maintenance of normal liver function; biotin, a B vitamin, supports cell growth and normal macronutrient metabolism; artichoke extract promotes a healthy liver and efficient digestive system by helping to stimulate the production of bile acid into the digestive tract; antioxidant-rich beetroot is an effective natural cleanser of the liver; dandelion root, considered to be a blood purifier, lends the blend an abundance of vitamins and minerals; finally, burdock root acts as a potent detoxifier, prompting your body to eliminate waste products.
